name: Stoic Life Navigator
description: Track, organize and manage your life as a Stoic from one place, digitally.A complete stoic Notion workspace and complete life operating system to manage your entire life, with more than 25+ templates inside, all designed to make your life easier.✓ Unlock organizing superpowers✓ Achieve true stoic life clarity and purpose✓ Organize, track and monitor your life in one place"Man conquers the world by conquering himself.” — Zeno of CitiumWhat's inside?Lifestyle Workout/StretchesSave different workou
features: Workout/StretchesSave different workouts or stretches to your database; Routines/HabitsTrack habits and stay on top of routines, simplified; Meal PlanPlan meals effectively, intuitively, and simply.; Home ImprovementPrioritize and pick your need to have/nice to have.; Daily Reflection JournalMorning and evening reflection templates.; Personal ManifestoWrite a statement to live by and then live by it.; Long Term GoalsCreate your life vision and long term goals; Goal Action PlanBreak down goals into actionable steps; To-Do ListPrioritize tasks and organize them in the calendar; CalendarOrganize your days, and plan tasks and events.
